name: L'Absolu Rouge Cream Lipstick
about: What it is:A cream lipstick that delivers vibrant color with up to 18 hours of comfortable wear in one swipe..Formulation Type:Lipstick.Benefits:Long-wearing.What Else You Need to Know:Enriched with 30 percent rose balm and hyaluronic acid, this moisturizing lipstick leaves lips hydrated and comfortable up to all day. Each long-lasting, ultra-creamy shade effortlessly glides over lips for stay-put color that wonu2019t bleed or smudge.
ingredients: Pentaerythrityl Isostearate/Caprate/Caprylate/Adipate, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Octyldodecyl Stearate, PEG-45/Dodecyl Glycol Copolymer, Cera Microcristallina/Microcrystalline Wax/Cire Microcristalline, Polyglyceryl-3 Beeswax, CI 15850/Red 7, Paraffin, Hydrogenated Castor Oil Dimer Dilinoleate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Mica, CI 45410/Red 28 Lake, Alumina, Rosa Centifolia Flower Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Rosa Hybrid Flower Extract, Tin Oxide, Aqua/Water/Eau, Glucomannan, Trihydroxystearin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Silica, Aluminum Hydroxide, Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Hydroxypalmitoyl Sphinganine, Hydroxypropyl Tetrahydropyrantriol, Synthetic Wax, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, CI 77492/Iron Oxides, CI 77891/Titanium Dioxide, CI 42090/Blue 1 Lake, Geraniol, Methyl 2-Octynoate, Hydroxycitronellal, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Alcohol, Parfum/Fragrance.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Using Le Lip Liner (sold separately), draw a line around the edges of your mouth. .-For a fuller look, overline lips..-Apply lipstick with a single stroke for intense color payoff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is super creamy and my lips feel hydrated. I loved the color. ud83dude0d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite color. It's hydrating and has a really nice shine. I like the scent too. It's my every day lipstick. However, it's not long wearing in my opinion. Comes off quite easily and definitely needs reapplication after eating or drinking g.

reviews.review_title: Colour 01 is an expensive colourless chapstick.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is not a pale, opaque lipstick like the picture.  Itu2019s actually a transparent chapstick that has no benefit beyond any other.  Iu2019m disappointed and CAD$52 for a transparent chapstick doesnu2019t encourage me to try u2018another shadeu2019, meaning one that has actual colour.  Iu2019m debating returning it but itu2019s dependent on my ability to reach the store.  Not good for me.another

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice for evening outings. Consistency is very creamy. Colour is intense. If you are looking for a strong creamy red lipstick, than go for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great for everyday use, very soft and a natural colour. High quality product.

reviews.review_title: Perfect combo of comfort and long lasting!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing combination of lasting power and comfort!  It is so hard to find a combination of both. Long lasting types can be dry and unnatural looking. This is the perfect combination of both.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Lancu00f4me since I was a teenager. The packaging for this lipstick is so pretty and love that it locks. It is hard to find a pink that I like with my pale skin tone, but this definitely works ud83dude0d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it. The texture is creamy and feels soft on the lips. the only downside is that it doesn't  last longer. I would still recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wasnu2019t sure while ordering but completely in love with it. A must have.

The department store where I used to buy my lipstick doesn't have many Lancome options anymore. I was over joyed when I found this one at Sephora. I take it everywhere with me. I live the shimmer. It's serious and fun at the same time.

reviews.review_title: Shocked that I love a light pink!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Usually I am not a fan of light pink due to my light skin tone and red hair; however, this color is stunning. Has such a beautiful shimmer and pairs nicely with Mariou2019s lipliner in the color: Lauren.
I have used this product for years and just love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It will smudge, transfer to drinks, remove when eating and drinking. Unless you don't move your lips, it will come off. However, it feels like lipbalm and it's hydrating. the color is nice and feels good on the lips. You need to reapply for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Treated myself to this lipstick and glad I did. Color is beautiful and glowy. Itu2019s also moisturizing which is a must for me. Iu2019m 46 and need to keep my skin and lips moisturized. Definitely recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Poor application. The color was fine but it did not correspond well with my complexion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the color of this lipstick. The Call me Sienna is a great color and good formula. I will say that after using this for a few days my lips felt dry so it needs to be paired with a nighttime lip mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I asked for a hydrating lipstick and this did not disappoint! The color is natural and the application is flawless. Iu2019m taking one star off because I cannot stand the scent/flavor of this!
This is such a beautiful lipstick. On me, this is the perfect MLBB shade. Gorgeous texture. I will definitely repurchase despite the price.
